title: How to unsubscribe from Midjourney
description: You can cancel your Midjourney subscription at any time through their website. Your cancellation will be effective at the end of your current billing cycle, and you'll retain access until then. No refunds are given for mid-subscription cancellations, except if you've used less than 20 GPU minutes since your last payment.

web.title: Cancel Midjourney Subscription via Website
web.description:
To cancel your Midjourney subscription via the website:

*   Go to the Midjourney website: midjourney.com/auth/signin/ and sign in with your Discord credentials.
*   Find the "Manage Subscription" option on the left-hand sidebar.
*   Click the "Cancel Plan" button on the "Manage Subscription" page.
*   Confirm your cancellation in the pop-up window.

discord.title: Cancel Midjourney Subscription via Discord
discord.description:
To cancel your Midjourney subscription via Discord:

*   Type `/subscribe` in the Midjourney Discord server.
*   Click the link provided by the bot.
*   Click the "Cancel Plan" button on the "Manage Subscription" page.
*   Confirm your cancellation in the pop-up window.

seo_text: Cancel Midjourney subscription, Midjourney unsubscribe, stop Midjourney payments, end Midjourney membership.
